title: The Walking Dead The Game iOS (iPhone/iPad) EP2-5
description:
Episodes 2,3,4 and 5 from the walking dead the game on iOS, needs jailbreak !

About the game :

**NOTE: Compatible with iPad 2 and up, and iPhone 4 and up - WILL NOT RUN ON EARLIER DEVICES**

The Walking Dead is a five-part episodic game series set in the same universe as Robert KirkmanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s award-winning comic books featuring Deputy Sheriff Rick Grimes. 



This is not another shoot Ã¢â‚¬Ëœem up; itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a game that explores some very dark psychological places, revealing that the undead are not the only thing to be afraid of when society crumbles.



In this brand new story, you are Lee Everett, a man given a second chance at life in a world devastated by the undead. With corpses returning to life and survivors stopping at nothing to maintain their own safety, protecting an orphaned girl named Clementine may offer him redemption in a world gone to hell.



Experience a dark, visceral and emotional series where every action and decision you make can result in the story changing around you. This tailored experience means that your story could be very different to that of someone else.

GAME FEATURES:



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Based on Robert Kirkman's award-winning comic book series: The Walking Dead allows gamers to experience the true horror of the zombie apocalypse, with artwork inspired by the original comic books. Live out events, meet people and visit locations from The Walking Dead lore.



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢A tailored game experience: Live with the profound and lasting consequences of the decisions you make in each episode. Your actions and choices will affect how your story plays out across the entire series.



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Act fast: You'll be forced to make decisions that are not only difficult, but require you to make an almost immediate choice. There's no time to ponder when the undead are pounding down the door.



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Adventure horror spanning across five episodes, plus special episode '400 Days': Gameplay involves meaningful decision-making, exploration, problem-solving and a constant fight for survival in a world overrun by the undead.



EPISODE LIST:



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Episode 1: A New Day (download for free on Appstore)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Episode 2: Starved For Help (included in torrent)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Episode 3: Long Road Ahead (included in torrent)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Episode 4: Around Every Corner (included in torrent)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Episode 5: No Time Left (included in torrent)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                 Release Notes

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Needs :



- Jailbreaked IPhone

- iFunBox Classic : http://dl.i-funbox.com/ifunbox_setup.exe

- The Walking Dead The Game - Episode 1 (download for free on the AppStore)

- Appsync (available on Cydia)



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                 Install Notes

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Open iFunBox

Click on the iFunBox Classic tab

Select your device

Go to "User applications", then "Walking Dead" and "Walkingdead101.app"

Open the "Pack" folder

Copy the folders "WalkingDead102", "103", "104", "105"

Play :)
